reviewText: Blow him away is wonderful. I was surprised there were so many techniques to learn. I thought i'd watch the film and already know what to do. About two techniques in I was excited to see what i was going to learn next. The instructions were clear and easy to understand and do. Thank you very much i am very pleased and look forward to your next dvd so that my guy can learn some new techniques as well.
Regardless of your persuasion...  gay,  bi,  straight...  I highly recommend this video.  It'll open horizons in your relationship, or give you skills to expand your repertoire.

Dr. Sayaka's Blow Joy and Hand Joy Video, "Blow Him Away" totally lived up to its namesake.  More than just a video about sex, Dr. Sayaka educated her audience on the joys and importance of true intimacy and playfulness as part of the sexual experience.  Her easy going and relaxed teaching style made what could have been a tongue in cheek topic (pun intended!) comfortable and fun.  Best of all I actually learned techniques I can use to spice things up and have him wondering, "where on earth did she learn that" and "please don't stop doing that".  In simpler terms, "He will be totally blown away!"

Dr. Sayaka has taught me that pleasing my partner should always be a joy. Sayaka clearly demonstrates many easy to use techniques that have rapidly spiced up my playtime.  This video has made me realize that I should be having just as much fun and be receiving just as much pleasure out of the experience as my lover does. Her encouragement of communication and connection between partners has dissolved my fears of trying new things and I can now confidently ask for feedback to better refine each technique. I look forward to coming back to this video time and time again to learn and discover new tips and tricks to heighten the joy surrounding the pleasure in my life. Highly recommended to anyone looking to reignite their playful passions!

There are no graphic scenes in this DVD. Just women licking and sucking zucchini squashes. This DVD is very educational. Dr. Sayaka talks with a heavy a$$ accent but is still understandable. She laughs a lot when teaching these sweet techniques with her mini zucchini in her mouth. There are so many different techniques I never knew existed. I personally dig the vacuum suck technique she talks about. She said most men cannot last 2 minutes from that vacuum technique. Nice educational DVD.

This is a great DVD, and sure to teach even a seasoned blow-joyer a few new tricks.  Dr. Sayaka is enthusiastic, entertaining, and most importantly, very knowledgable on the subject. I can't recommend it highly enough, and can't wait for Dr. Sayaka to produce some more videos!

This video is a must see. Grab your friends or lover, a glass of wine and a note pad, sit back and take it all in. Dr. Sayaka's joy and compassion shines through as she instructs how to connect deeper with intimacy and oral foreplay. Share this video with all the people you know who tend to shy from this topic. Let the world be blown away!

How do you do an instructional video for hand job and blow job techniques without offending those who are too prim for porn?  Here's one way:  take a cute, vivacious Japanese-American sexologist and have her conduct a living room "seminar" with four housewives, using some zucchini and a few fairly abstract dildos.  There are a lot of jokes and laughs, but Dr. Sayaka Adachi does an admirable job of covering the basic hand job and BJ techniques, plus many more-advanced ones, without ever being crude about it.

If you're a relative newcomer to this kind of sex, or simply want to improve your skills, Dr. Sayaka demonstrates all of the essential moves, including many two-handed maneuvers and the combined hand-and-mouth technique I recommend for oral if you are not an aspiring deep-throater.  Altogether, this is an enjoyable, funny, and very thorough guide to the most effective techniques for both oral and manual sex.  It's highly recommended even if you aren't too shy to look for porn, and of course it is doubly recommended if porn turns you off.
